description:
Fugen had resolved to take out Bunchu along with himself in a deadly explosion, but Bunchu survived the blast. Bunchu has now set his sights on Genshi Tenson instead and sets off for Mount Kongrong to fight him, followed quickly by Taikobo, Yozen, and Supushan. If even the Twelve Elite Sennin couldn`t defeat Bunchu, Taikobo has very little chance... but Taikobo is determined to overcome him, no matter what it takes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blinding Light, Deafening Silence, and Then...
